sub_title: Study Director Analytical & Physical Chemistry at Charles River Laboratories
summary:
Method development and validation for quantification of pharmaceuticals, industrial and agro chemicals in various samples (formulations, animal food, water).
Physico-chemical characterization of chemicals required for registration under REACH and EMA.

Specialties: 
Mass spectrometry: 
          - MALDI-ToF MS
          - LC-ESI-MS/MS
Chromatography:
          - SEC and HPLC coupled with different detectors (RI, MALLS, PAD, viscometer)
Spectroscopy: 
          - UV/VIS/IR
          - Fluorescence
H-NMR

Upstream and downstream processing of proteins in E. coli, L. lactis and Pichia 
-Protein purification using HPLC and FPLC
-Protein characterization

Immunochemical methods: 
           -ELISA
           -Western blot
           -Antibody purification
DNA/RNA  isolation and purification, PCR.
Different cloning techniques, vector systems applied with E. coli, L. lactis and Pichia pastoris
Bioinformatic tools
